text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> Bugzilla is not a playground.

Hi Konstantin Kolinko ,

I'm not playing with Bugzilla .I'm going to implement Bugzilla Concept for my project and trying to understand how it work ?
creator: ranjeet.singh25oct@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
While this Bugzilla is open to the public, it is not free for any one to use for anything they like.

This is the bug tracker for the Apache Tomcat project and is to be used only for tracking bugs in Apache Tomcat. It is not for people to track the development of their pet project that happens to run on Tomcat.

Further abuse of the ASF Bugzilla instance will result in the immediate and permanent suspention of your account.
